name: com.sag.save-system
description: This package provides easy to use API to save and load your game.

samples.description: Simple platformer 2D game that shows how you can use Save System in your project. Also, shows how to utilize custom GUID providers.
Shows how to spawn objects at runtime so they can be saved and restored on load.
You can run this sample to have an idea on how much time Save System uses to save/load/sync game state
